channel.title: [317] Client - Webclient Ready [Just Jar sign and upload]
channel.description:
I didn't know were to post this, but this is a client that I made.
This client is webclient ready, It also removes the crappy game frame.
[Credits] I dont know who originally made the client because it came with a blank source, but It said something like wilddreams so credits go to him
[center]Download Link[/center] [center][url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/34447976/Runescape%20DL%20Clients/RS2_Remake_Client_10-8-11.rar]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/34447976/Runescape%20DL%20Clients/RS2_Remake_Client_10-8-11.rar[/url][/center]
I changed the background to the rs2 2007 background [img]http://i1084.photobucket.com/albums/j414/boloros/MoparScape%20Client%20Pics/background.png[/img]
I changed the grey loading bar back to the maroon loading bar [img]http://i1084.photobucket.com/albums/j414/boloros/MoparScape%20Client%20Pics/evolved0018.png[/img]
I changed the login box to the original rs login box [img]http://i1084.photobucket.com/albums/j414/boloros/MoparScape%20Client%20Pics/evolved0019.png[/img]
[img]http://i1084.photobucket.com/albums/j414/boloros/MoparScape%20Client%20Pics/evolved0021.png[/img]
I changed the client to connect to my no-ip adress - this can easily be changed [img]http://i1084.photobucket.com/albums/j414/boloros/MoparScape%20Client%20Pics/evolved0024.png[/img]
I changed the welcome message and replaced the custom icons to the original icons [img]http://i1084.photobucket.com/albums/j414/boloros/MoparScape%20Client%20Pics/evolved0025--2.png[/img]
I removed the custom HP bar and it now loads the original HP bar [img]http://i1084.photobucket.com/albums/j414/boloros/MoparScape%20Client%20Pics/evolved0026.png[/img]
If you liked the client than comment. If you didn't then tell me what you didn't like about it. Feedback is much appreciated

item.title: [317] Client - Webclient Ready [Just Jar sign and upload]
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

boloros:

I posted this because a lot of servers have custom clients and I absolutely hate them. This client gives that more real feeling of playing runescape. It was supposed to look more like the original 317 client.

Not many do anymore, most use the newest rs one

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Client - Webclient Ready [Just Jar sign and upload]
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Fix the inventory, it’s a bit off. Also, get rid of those dumb orbs that do nothing. Fix the buttons on the bottom so instead of saying “Public chat” “Private Chat” and “Requests”, it says what runescape says with the sprites and everything. Also, change the _ to a * when typing (Where it says Marc: _ make it say Marc: *) Otherwise looks average.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Client - Webclient Ready [Just Jar sign and upload]
item.dc:creator: @boloros boloros
item.description:
@boloros wrote:

I didn’t know were to post this, but this is a client that I made.

This client is webclient ready, It also removes the crappy game frame.

[Credits]
I dont know who originally made the client because it came with a blank source, but It said something like wilddreams so credits go to him

[center]Download Link[/center]
[center]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/34447976/Runescape%20DL%20Clients/RS2_Remake_Client_10-8-11.rar[/center]

I changed the background to the rs2 2007 background

I changed the grey loading bar back to the maroon loading bar

I changed the login box to the original rs login box

I changed the client to connect to my no-ip adress - this can easily be changed

I changed the welcome message and replaced the custom icons to the original icons

I removed the custom HP bar and it now loads the original HP bar

If you liked the client than comment. If you didn’t then tell me what you didn’t like about it. Feedback is much appreciated

Read full topic
